Posts.Content: I just had my lumpectomy on the 18th...my cancer was 8mm...i was diagnosed with stage 1a, er and pr pos..her2 neg....dr said i dont need to take hormone pills..but i need 4 weeks of targeted radiation...this is my second cancer in 9 mos..i had stage 1 endometrial cancer, had a total hysterectomy..my question...where am i gonna get it next ...have a hard time believing i wont get it again somewhere...i also dont know why im not taking pills..i mean his explanation was that by taking pills for 5 years will only increase my survival by 1%, , and the possible side effects of the pills is more of an issue..im suppose to have a genetic test done because all kinds of cancer runs in my family..trying not to think about cancer on a daily basis, but mind just seems to linger there..
Posts.Title: Got my ultrasound back..i have a 4 mm lump with spiculation, have...

Posts.Content: Thank you so much Karen, for your encouraging words..I have done a complete no no, which is reading online info..unfortunately my nature is of a pessimist, so afraid, its throughout my body..cancer runs rampant in both my parents families..i will try my very best to put my thoughts aside and wait for the biopsy results..so very difficult.
Posts.Title: Got my ultrasound back..i have a 4 mm lump with spiculation, have...

Posts.Content: I had my biopsy on tuesday, they scheduled an appt for the 23rd to tell me results...they called me today and want me to come in, they have results...im scared to death, im shaking all over.why do they want to see me before my appt...i had a 4mm solid lump with very sllight spiculation..they took 4 samples in the biopsy....im trembling

Posts.Content: My blood work came back, Er and Pr positive, HER 2 negative..scared to look it up online ..do you know what that all means and how bad it is..i figure you or someone could break it to me gently..my dr appt is on wednesday and i would like to prepare myself

Posts.Title: Got my ultrasound back..i have a 4 mm lump with spiculation, have...

Posts.Content: I had uterine cancer in april, i wasnt diagnosed until after a complete hysterectomy..it was stage 0...confined to the endometrium.now they find a 4mm lump with spiculation on my left breast..i think cancer is out to get me..scared ! I have a biopsy on tuesday, its classified as a bi rads 4
Posts.Title: Got my ultrasound back..i have a 4 mm lump with spiculation, have...

Posts.Content: Results, i have grade 2 invasive ductal carcinoma..i did blood work tydy.. have an MRI on the 23rd, then surgery to remove lump, and a few lymph nodes...if its in lymph nodes, then i guess the story changes..if its not in nodes, then radiation and pills for 5 years...im still a bit shakey and a whole lot scared..all kinds of what ifs goes through your mind..definately do not like this journey im about to embark on..

Posts.Title: Got my ultrasound back..i have a 4 mm lump with spiculation, have...

Posts.Content: HappyFeet1,           I seen the surgeon today...they are going to do a lumpectomy and remove some lymph nodes..it sounds so similar to yours...if lymph nodes arent effected then i will do targeted radiation and pills after that...my MRI came back with nothing else showing except my tiny 4mm tumor...my surgery is on the 18th of feb... i pray my nodes are clean, so do not want to do chemotherepy.
